The 3rd Cavalry Division (, 3-ya Kavaleriiskaya Diviziya) was a cavalry formation of the Russian Imperial Army.
Organization
*1st Cavalry Brigade
**3rd Dragoon Regiment
**3rd Uhlan Regiment
*2nd Cavalry Brigade
**3rd Hussar Regiment
**3rd Cossack Regiment
*3rd Horse Artillery Battalion
